message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product.  While it's worth significantly more to me than $800,000, I understand your value assessment. I'm willing to part with it for $950,000.  This price reflects a fair compromise and allows for a substantial profit for you. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $875,000. This still leaves a good margin for you while also aligning more closely with my valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value the product higher, I'm willing to be flexible.  I can come down to $900,000.  This price still allows me to recoup a good portion of my investment.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $885,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between our valuations.
